name: Inland Real Estate Income Trust, Inc.
description: Inland Real Estate Income Trust, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on acquiring and managing a diversified portfolio of income-generating commercial properties. Established in 2014, the company aims to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns to its investors through a disciplined investment strategy. Inland Real Estate primarily invests in grocery-anchored shopping centers and other necessity-based retail properties located in high-density suburban markets across the United States. The company leverages the expertise of its seasoned management team and a robust network of real estate professionals to identify and acquire properties with strong fundamentals and growth potential. Additionally, Inland Real Estate is committed to enhancing the value of its properties through proactive asset management and strategic leasing initiatives. The REIT's objectives include generating stable cash flow, providing consistent dividend income, and achieving long-term appreciation in asset value. With a focus on tenant quality and property location, Inland Real Estate seeks to build a resilient and sustainable portfolio that can withstand market fluctuations and provide enduring value to its shareholders.

seo.meta_title: Inland Real Estate Income Trust, Inc. | REIT Investment Opportunities
seo.meta_description: Explore Inland Real Estate Income Trust, Inc., a leading REIT focused on grocery-anchored and necessity-based retail properties. Discover our investment strategy and portfolio.

faq.question: What type of properties does Inland Real Estate invest in?
faq.answer: Inland Real Estate invests primarily in grocery-anchored shopping centers and necessity-based retail properties.

faq.question: When was Inland Real Estate founded?
faq.answer: Inland Real Estate was founded in 2014.

faq.question: Where is Inland Real Estate headquartered?
faq.answer: Inland Real Estate is headquartered in Oak Brook, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Inland Real Estate?
faq.answer: The CEO of Inland Real Estate is Mark C. Zettler.

faq.question: What is the investment strategy of Inland Real Estate?
faq.answer: Inland Real Estate focuses on acquiring and managing a diversified portfolio of income-generating commercial properties to provide stable cash flow and long-term appreciation.
